metadata.title: CVE-2019-12615 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in get_vdev_port_node_info inarch/sparc/kernel/mdesc.c in the Linux kernel through 5.1.6. There is anunchecked kstrdup_const of node_info->vdev_port.name, which might allow anattacker to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference and systemcrash).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-12615` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-152-generic - 5.4.0-37.41~18.04.1
linux-image-5.4.0-152-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-37.41~18.04.1
